Text.Page:
If we can wipe out those {@LinkCreature:39#170#loyal jalmaraks} to the east of camp, that's one fewer force the arachnens can use against us.

If you kill any on your travels, bring me the heads.
You've performed a valuable service for the federation, and for all of us here. I hope you'll stick around.

The arachnens control the {@LinkCreature:39#170#loyal jalmaraks}. We want them gone.

Are they gone yet?
